caption: Federated analytics
title: Empowering data scientists and AI developers
text:
In addition to facilitating exchanges between clinical researchers, Triall CIX will 
provide a platform for innovation in AI and federated data analytics. Data 
scientists and algorithm developers can leverage diverse clinical datasets that 
are interfaced with CIX to design, train, and implement advanced analytics 
services. By default, clinical dataset providers retain full control over access 
terms and conditions and are directly compensated for providing computational 
access.

caption: Data use cases
title: Unlocking data-driven clinical research
text:
Working with clinicians, data scientists, and AI model developers, Triall CIX 
targets a variety of use cases to enable more data-driven clinical research, 
including:

sublist.title: Synthesising Historical Control Groups
sublist.text:
Leveraging control data from past trials to reduce patient burden, lower costs, 
and advance study timelines, making use of Bayesian and Propensity Score 
Matching statistical techniques.

sublist.title: Training Deep Learning Models for Computer Aided Diagnosis (CDx)
sublist.text:
Providing AI developers access to diverse clinical data in a privacy-preserving 
way to train Computer Aided Diagnosis and other types of Deep Learning models
for clinical application.

sublist.title: Offering Insights for Study Planning & Feasibility
sublist.text:
Analysing aggregate study performance data for more accurate prediction of 
study timelines, drop-out rates, and sample size requirements.

sublist.title: Identifying Drug Targets & Trends
sublist.text:
Opening up new avenues for clinical, empirical, and epidemiological research 
into health trends and disease predictors.
